snippet: Dozens of species of popular West Coast rockfish that were once so overfished that the fishing grounds were declared a federal economic disaster are now abundant.
abstract: Monterey Bay Aquarium Seafood Watch program reports that dozens of species of popular West Coast rockfish that were once overfished are now abundant; consumers are being encouraged to eat 21 species of rockfish that they had been warned to avoid.
lead_paragraph: Dozens of species of popular West Coast rockfish that were once so overfished that the fishing grounds were declared a federal economic disaster are now abundant.

headline.main: Revival of Species Puts Some Fish Back on Plates
headline.print_headline: Revival of Species Puts Some Fish Back on Plates
